A superantipoison is a potion made by using unicorn horn dust on an irit potion (unf), requiring 48 Herblore, yielding a superantipoison(3) and 106.3 Herblore experience. A dose of superantipoison cures poison and provides poison immunity for 6 minutes.

A superantipoison(1) can be found in the southern most collapsed building north-east of the Observatory, near the entrance to the Observatory Dungeon with a respawn time of 55 seconds.

Creating a superantipoison from scratch in the Seers' Village/Catherby area is a requirement for the medium Kandarin Diary.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

7 April 2016
(update)

Drinking any kind of antipoison will no longer decrease your poison immunity.

29 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

9 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

A '''superantipoison''' is a [[Herblore#Potions|potion]] made by using [[unicorn horn dust]] on an [[irit potion (unf)]], requiring 48 [[Herblore]], yielding a superantipoison(3) and 106.3 Herblore [[experience]]. A dose of superantipoison cures [[poison]] and provides poison immunity for 6 minutes.

A superantipoison(1) can be found in the southern most collapsed building north-east of the [[Observatory]], near the entrance to the [[Observatory Dungeon]] with a respawn time of 55 seconds.

Creating a superantipoison from scratch in the [[Seers' Village]]/[[Catherby]] area is a requirement for the medium [[Kandarin Diary]].
